page.title: 10ECOLOGY - FOOTPATHS
page.content: FOOTPATH 30/68 Via Whitehall Cottages and Llwyn-y-Ffynnon farm starts at B4309 road near Fan Quarry, Meinciau, along Llwynteg road to cottages, past Fan and Llwyn-y-Ffynnon farms, through fields, ends at stile on B4309. FOOTPATH 30/69 Whitehall Cottages to Fan-Kidwelly road starts at Footpath 30/68 through fields, ends opposite Footpath 30/57 on Fan-Kidwelly road. FOOTPATH 30/70 Via Bwlchwythaint starts at Fan-Kidwelly road near Pantymeillion, ends on Meinciau-Penylan road near Hengoed. FOOTPATH 30/71 Lancwm road to Bwlch-Wythaint starts on Fan-Kidwelly road at Lancwm-Ffynnonwen road junction, through fields to Bwlchwythaint, ends at Footpath 30/70.
